codeSystems.description: Tissue types for biological samples (from the bio_sample table).

codeSystems.description: Categories of relevant concomitant diseases.

codeSystems.description: Categories of concomitant medications.

codeSystems.description: Type of liver donation (complete vs partial).

codeSystems.description: Dialysis type used for the donor prior to kidney transplantation.

codeSystems.description: Types of instrumental investigation tests conducted.

codeSystems.description: Intraoperative complications during liver transplantation.

codeSystems.name: KidneySideCS
codeSystems.title: Kidney Side CodeSystem
codeSystems.description: Side of the kidney for nephrectomy / transplant context.

codeSystems.description: Units of measurement used for laboratory results, aligned with the lab_result unit conceptual domain.

codeSystems.name: LabTestNameCS
codeSystems.title: Lab Test Name
codeSystems.description: Types of laboratory tests conducted.

codeSystems.name: OutcomeTypeNameCS
codeSystems.title: Outcome Type Name
codeSystems.description: Types of clinical outcomes after transplant.

codeSystems.name: PatientABOGroupCS
codeSystems.title: Patient ABO Group CodeSystem
codeSystems.description: ABO blood groups for transplant recipients (maps from OMOP A/B/AB/0).

codeSystems.description: Class II HLA loci relevant to transplant matching.

codeSystems.description: Result of the instrumental investigation test conducted (Normal / Abnormal).

codeSystems.name: PatientRhFactorCS

codeSystems.description: Rh factor of the transplant recipient (maps from OMOP Positive/Negative).

codeSystems.name: PostEventTypeNameCS

codeSystems.description: Types of post-transplant events.

codeSystems.description: Type of pre-transplant medication record.

codeSystems.name: ReferenceGenomeBuildCS

codeSystems.description: Reference genome build names.

codeSystems.name: VisitTypeCS
